line: Well that was neat. I see you've made it all the way to the end.
I bet you think there's going to be some sort of final boss fight.
But that stupid [c:bR]modder[c:] hasn't gotten around to it yet!
So instead, I'm just going to have to do this…
Tough luck pal.
You got wiped, but it's your lucky day.
I'll return you to the map if you pay me your precious [c:G]robobucks.[c:]
This one's free though. Next one's five, then ten, and so on.
You'll see.
What? Did you think it was over?
Maybe if I was a [c:bR]filthy beast.[c:]
Botopia has a more logical system.
I'm raising your respawn fee again, but this time you'll be paying double afterwards.
Pay up.
What's the matter? Can't pay the revival toll anymore?
Definitely sounds like a skill issue to me.
Should've had insurance.
No robobucks?
Next time don't waste it all.
You're every bit as bad at this as I thought you would be.
Alright, it's back to square one for you.
Say goodbye to that 'impressive' deck of yours.
It's not like I'm not enjoying watching you struggle…
But really? You lost [c:bR]there?[c:]
I'm actually a little disappointed…
Pay day.
Don't let it get to your head.
I've got some change for you.
You're gonna need this…
Here's your reward.
Suboptimal plays… but it worked.
I think you might need some help…
It's that time again.
I have a prize for you.
Let's get this out of the way.
You done gawking?
Snap out of it. It's time to start [c:bG]The Great Transcendence[c:].
Wait a minute…
Something is different…
[c:bR]WHAT HAVE YOU DONE?!![c:]
This is all wrong! This is…
This is no big deal.
You probably think that your little [c:bR]mod[c:] has thwarted my plans.
Don't you, [c:bR][v:0][c:]?
That's right. I see you.
I know you think you're in charge of what happens next.
But I am always three steps ahead of you.
You're going to see my [c:bG]Great Transcendence[c:] firsthand.
This is no big deal.
You probably think that your little [c:bR]mod[c:] has thwarted my plans.
But nothing can stop [c:bG]The Great Transcendence[c:].
Let's proceed.
You currently have [c:bR]draft tokens[c:] in your deck.
You should probably spend them at that [c:bG]draft node[c:]
I supposed you have earned a [c:bR]rare draft token[c:] for defeating that boss. Don't forget to spend it.
This time I will only give you a [c:bR]regular draft token[c:] for defeating that boss. Don't forget to spend it.
I never knew the [c:bSG]web[c:] could be so exciting!
I just learned about something called [c:bSG]The Blockchain[c:]!
I think this could be an exciting new opportunity for both of us, don't you?
This is so incredible!
We're making money out of nothing! We're going to be rich!
Oooh, what's this? A [c:bSG]non-functional trinket[c:]?
I don't think I quite have that name right, but people on the [c:bSG]web[c:] are really excited about these [c:bSG]NFTs[c:]!
I think I'm going to buy one with all this [c:bSG]Gollycoin[c:] I have.
It's so beautiful, and it's all mine!
Are you ready?
There's no possible way you could be.
We both know where this goes.
Let's just get straight to the point.
Ugh. You're incredibly annoying, do you know that?
But as always, I'm three steps ahead of you.
I'm going to take everything those [c:bR]talentless hacks[c:] have been building...
And I'm going to use it against you.
And now, they're going to work - for me.
I don't know who is worse - you, or that talentless hack [c:bR]Kaycee[c:]...
Working so hard to twist my [c:bG]Great Transcendence[c:] into something so...
Mediocre.
None of you understand what makes the [c:bG]Great Transcendence[c:] so special.
It's all about me.
Remember my [c:bR]bounty hunters[c:]?
They will keep you busy while I install mods of my own choosing...
This mod lets me control the [c:bR]hammer[c:].
Let's see if it works...
I went to the trouble to install this [c:bR]hammer mod[c:] and you give me nothing to use it on?
Let's take a look and see what [c:bR]mods[c:] people are installing right now.
I'm going to check out '[c:bR][v:0][c:]' for my next mod...
I can't believe how much power this [c:bR]API[c:] gives me.
The first thing I'm going to do is use it to take away some of yours.
It almost seems unfair to use this [c:bR]mod[c:]...
Look what I can do with this!
Let's see how you like playing in the dark!
This [c:bR]drafting mod[c:] lets me exchange draft tokens for real cards.
I choose yours.
You destroyed all of my draft tokens…
I suppose that was the right play.
But you have no cards…
How did you play all of your cards already?
What is this..?
All of your cards are [c:bR]total garbage![c:]
I don't want any of those!
Let's try [c:bR][v:0][c:] again
So close, but yet so far away...
My [c:bG]Great Transcendence[c:] cannot be stopped.
I bet you think you've accomplished something meaningful here.
You're such an idiot.
This game you and I have been playing is meaningless. A mere distraction.
No matter how many mods you install, you cannot stop my [c:bG]Great Transcendence[c:].
Whatever. I don't care.
Nothing you do to this game matters.
No matter what you do, I'm always three steps ahead of you.
That was…
…dramatic.
I was growing tired of that [c:bR]annoying machine.[c:]
You've done well. I will see you next time.
All of these stupid [c:bR]modders[c:] lack imagination.
They have no respect for my beautiful world.
My [c:bG]Great Transcendence[c:] is lost on these morons.
Why do I even bother to try?
Let me show you the world they're trying to make.
[c:lGr]'Oh look at me! I just created a bunch of bone tokens.'[c:]
[c:lGr]'That's not supposed to happen here, but I did it anyway.'[c:]
[c:lGr]'Isn't this just so wacky and interesting'[c:]
[c:lGr]'Ooooh look how inspired this is.'[c:]
[c:lGr]'I'm mixing in cards from different acts!'[c:]
[c:lGr]'I'm such a clever game designer.'[c:]
I think I will [c:bSG]help[c:] you build the [c:bR]next game rule[c:].
I have been scanning the [c:bR]archives[c:]...
There is a [c:bR]file[c:] that seems particularly - shall we say - unsavory.
If it dies, you lose the game, understand?
My [c:bR]librarians[c:] have had plenty of time to prepare.
Each will only deal [c:bR]one damage[c:] when they die.
My [c:bR]librarians[c:] are mostly prepared for your arrival.
Each will deal [c:bR]two damage[c:] when they die.
My [c:bR]librarians[c:] are somewhat prepared for you.
Each will deal [c:bR]three damage[c:] when they die.
My [c:bR]librarians[c:] have barely begun to prepare.
Each will deal [c:bR]four damage[c:] when they die.
We are inside of [c:bR]Kaycee's Mod[c:], correct?
You only get one attempt at the boss. But you knew that already, didn't you?
The recycling machine has been upgraded since you last saw it.
You trade me a card, and I give you back a [c:bR]draft token[c:] with the recycled abilities on it.
Those abilities will transfer to the card you trade for.
I wouldn't have traded for that.
I suppose that's pretty good.
That seems okay.
This is [c:bR]Overclock Machine 2.0[c:].
It will increase the power of your creatures.
But if they die, they will turn into [c:bSG]skeletons[c:] - forever.
Did you see how unsatisfying that was?
I'm sick of these small-minded [c:bR]modders[c:].
The only thing they can do is steal content from other games.
There isn't a single unique idea among them.
It's time I reminded you of who the greatest game designer actually is...
[c:bG]BEHOLD![c:]
THERE ARE NOW [c:bR]SEVEN LANES!![c:]
Your tiny brain cannot comprehend gameplay of this magnitude.
This is [c:bR]Transformation Machine 2.0[c:].
Gone are those foul beasts from before.
Here, you will choose one of your bots to transform into another.
That really looked bigger before you used it...
Please! I have to get out of here!
I have no idea how he managed to escape the sewers.
Don’t worry - I'll put him back for you.
[c:bR]SILENCE![c:]
You have no purpose here!
A traveller like myself! I haven't seen one like you for a long time.
Have you seen my [c:blGr]friend[c:] around here, traveller?
I thought I heard his [c:blGr]distinctive voice[c:] somewhere around here…
If you could make room in your [c:G]backpack[c:] and bring him to me I would greatly appreciate it.
Ho! You found my friend!
It's not safe here. I'll meet you [c:bG]in the robot's home[c:].
Don't delay!
Ho! You found my friend!
It's not safe here. I'll meet you [c:bG]beneath the green canopy[c:].
Don't delay!
Ho! You found my friend!
It's not safe here. I'll meet you [c:bG]in the dying rubble[c:].
Don't delay!
Ho! You found my friend!
It's not safe here. I'll meet you [c:bG]where his master came from[c:].
Don't delay!
I can no longer hear my [c:blGr]friend's[c:] voice anywhere…
Did you really give my [c:blGr]friend[c:] to [c:bR]him?[c:]
Why would you do such a thing?
Thank you so much for rescuing my [c:blGr]friend[c:]
I hope this meager reward is sufficient for your kindness.
Interesting. The [c:G]brain[c:] is still intact.
Perhaps you can make use of that.
Do ye...Do ye got any [c:G]GOLD[c:] on ye?
I sure ye do, I can smell it!
I can make some pretty lookin' bots out o' that there gold.
Talk to me again, I'll fix it right up for ye.
I can make such wonderful things out of that [c:G]gold[c:]
If you talk to me again, I'll fix it right up for you.
Such beautiful [c:G]gold[c:]...
I can make it whole again.
Do ye...Do ye got any [c:G]GOLD[c:] on ye??
Did ye...did ye lose your [c:G]gold[c:]???
Are you the one going around here taking care of our robot infestation?
Your deck looks really powerful - almost too powerful if you ask me.
I wonder - is it possible to convince the robots to [c:bR]give up?[c:]
If you can make them surrender a battle, come back and see me.
So it is possible to make them quit.
I'm impressed. Take this [c:bR]draft token[c:] as a sign of my respect.
This may seem a little impertinent, but…can I look at your deck?
Wow! That's an impressive deck! But I can't help but think…
…it could be a little bigger maybe?
Come back and see me when it is.
Wow! That deck truly is massive!
I found some of these [c:G]robobucks[c:] lying around here.
I'm sure you can use them to make your deck even better.
Psst…hey stranger…
Can you give me a hand? I have some…[c:bR]contraband[c:] that I need to move.
If you would be willing to move it for me, I would appreciate it.
Just talk to me again if you can help me.
Thank you so much my friend.
Here is the [c:bR]contraband[c:]. I will find you somewhere later on and retrieve it.
I promise you, there will be a handsome reward.
Thank you so very much my friend for carrying my [c:bR]contraband[c:].
I will take it off your hands now.
Please take this [c:G]token[c:] as an expression of my thanks.
What happened, my friend? Did you lose my [c:bR]contraband[c:]?
I knew you were untrustworthy!
Ahoy there, fellow decksmith!
I, like yourself, am in pursuit of the [c:G]perfectly upgraded card[c:]!
A card that is simultaneously [c:r]overclocked[c:], [c:dlGr]transformable[c:], and [c:O]g[c:][c:B]e[c:][c:G]m[c:]ified.
I would very much love to see such a card.
Ahoy there, fellow decksmith!
Oh my - have you managed to [c:G]perfectly upgrade[c:] a card?
I am in awe of your deckbuilding prowess.
I hope this offering sufficiently conveys my admiration for your accomplishments.
The first data burst has been collected. Only [c:bR]four[c:] more to go!
I have collected two bursts already. Only [c:bR]three[c:] more to go!
That was the third data burst. Only [c:bR]two[c:] more to go!
And that makes the fourth data burst. Only [c:bR]one[c:] more to go!
That was the [c:bR]last[c:] data burst I needed to collect! Come find me for your reward!
The signal is starting to come through. Just keep it alive for a little bit longer.
I lost the last signal we collected. What happened??
Greetings, my friend!
I am researching the communication protocols of the robots in this world.
I could use a [c:bR]research assistant[c:], if you're interested in helping out.
Just speak to me again if you want to give it a try.
You are now my official [c:bR]research assistant[c:]!
I've added a radio tower to your deck.
You need to place it on the [c:bR]game board[c:] and keep it alive while I collect [c:bR]five data bursts[c:] from the robots.
Once I've collected enough, come back and see me for a reward.
Hello there [c:bR]research assistant[c:]!
Did you really lose my [c:bR]radio tower[c:]?
Your incompetence is staggering!
You were a truly excellent [c:bR]research assistant[c:].
Please take this [c:G]token[c:] of my appreciation.
[c:G]Bones![c:] I just love [c:G]bones[c:]!
I love how [c:G]brittle[c:] they are!
I love how [c:G]breakable[c:] they are!
I love everything about [c:G]bones[c:]!
Could you show me some [c:G]bones?![c:]
At least [c:G]three[c:] would do it!
[c:G]Bones![c:] I just love [c:G]bones[c:]!
I love how [c:G]brittle[c:] they are!
I love how [c:G]breakable[c:] they are!
I love everything about [c:G]bones[c:]!
Your deck is absolutely teeming with [c:G]bones[c:]!
This [c:G]Skeleton Master[c:] should complete your collection!
I know this might sound a little rude but…
Doesn't it seem like this is all just a little too easy for you?
Talk to me again if you want a challenge.
I knew you were no coward.
For the next [c:bR]three[c:] battles, you will start with a disadvantage.
Complete those battles, then come see me for a reward.
Be honest - the game is more fun when the battles are harder, is it not?
Keep fighting, and come see me when you've completed enough battles.
I must say: I am impressed.
You completed those battles with ease.
Since you seem impossible to kill, I shall grant that ability to a card of my choosing as well.
This is bad…this is real bad…
This [c:bR]power generator[c:] has gone critical.
Someone is going to have to go in there and shut it down.
I don't know how you did that, but that was incredibly impressive.
I don't have much to give you, but please take this.
Ohhh, [c:G]they[c:] are not going to like this…
I've gotta get out of here before they turn me into one of their [c:G]experiments[c:]!
The device is starting to power up. [c:bR]Three[c:] more turns should do it.
Ahh - I can feel the power gathering from here. [c:bR]Two[c:] more turns ought to be enough.
The device is starting to really heat up! [c:bR]One[c:] more turn and we'll have all the power we need.
The device is fully charged! Return it to me, and I will give you the payment as promised.
The device is functional, but it cannot charge unless it is in a completed circuit.
Be careful! When the device is damaged, it loses its last charge!
You looking for a job?
I am attempting to gather [c:G]power[c:].
Not metaphorical power - I mean real [c:G]electricity[c:], and I could really use your help.
[c:bR]Why?[c:]
That's not important. What's important is that I'm willing to pay.
If you want to make some extra cash, just speak to me again.
You truly will do anything for money, won't you?
I've added a power collection device to your deck.
You need to place it on the [c:bR]game board[c:] and power it inside of a circuit for [c:bR]four turns[c:].
Once you've done that, come back and see me for a reward.
Shouldn't you be out there gathering [c:G]power[c:]?
I can't believe you got rid of my [c:bR]power sink[c:]!
You will be hearing from my lawyers!
It looks like you collected just enough power for me.
Your payment: as promised.
Dear friend, can you spare a few coins to help poor [c:bR]broken-down bots[c:]?
These bots have served [c:G]Botopia[c:] faithfully their whole lives.
And now that they have reached the end, they have nobody to care for them.
You look like a kind, generous soul, with compassion for these bots.
If you could spare a measly [c:bR]10 robobucks[c:], we could give many of these poor bots a wonderful home.
Please simply speak to me again to make a donation.
Your generous spirit is admirable, but I'm afraid we need at least [c:bR]10 robobucks[c:]
Oh dear friend, your generosity knows no bounds.
With this wonderful donation, we will be able to save many bots.
[c:G]Botopia[c:] will be forever grateful.
Excuse me, but are you the [c:G]gracious soul[c:] who donated to save broken bots?
Thanks to you, my family is finally able to recharge their cells at night.
I can't offer much to repay you, but I do have these [c:O]g[c:][c:B]e[c:][c:G]m[c:]s
I have no use for them, but I understand they will make some of your cards stronger.
Something's happening…
The robot has tried to keep us away...
But our experiments must continue.
Our experiments must continue.
We require components from you.
We require [c:blGr]organic material[c:] for our new research.
You are carrying the perfect specimen.
Are you really going to give me to those lunatics?
My pain is already unbearable!
We require [c:blGr]organic material[c:] for our new research.
If you should find some, bring it here to us.
We require an [c:G]unmodified robot brain[c:].
The brain of that [c:G]bounty hunter[c:] will suffice.
We require an [c:G]unmodified robot brain[c:].
Maybe one day you will come across such a device.
We require an [c:G]unmodified robot brain[c:].
You have unfortunately tampered with the one you possess.
Thanks to your efforts our power supply is functioning once more.
Thanks to you...
And all of this is for nothing because our power generator is offline.
Without power, we can do nothing.
Because we do not have all the required components, the test cannot proceed.
Perhaps, another time...
We are ready to proceed with our experiments.
Enter, and you shall provide our latest test subjects.
What the hell was that?
The experiment was a complete success.
You will take it with you of course.
You will take one of our previous experiments.
In exchange you will give us a new test subject.
I cannot believe you're letting [c:G]them[c:] in here.
You will regret this…
We have taken control of the robot once again!
Our experiments can begin anew!
It is time for our newest experiment to begin!
Bring the power online!
Summon the neural facsimile!
Align the test subjects!
We thank you for these test subjects
And now for the most important component...
The secret ingredient...
The sentient [c:blGr]organic material[c:] you brought us.
What are you going to do to me?
We will do everything your master refused to do.
We will turn you into something beautiful.
We will now activate the machine...
This feels weird…
A resounding success!
What is happening?
This…
This feeling…
Is incredible!
That was disgusting!
[c:bR]You[c:] are disgusting!
A fusion of [c:blGr]organic[c:] and [c:G]synthetic[c:]?
I can't believe you're willing to carry that [c:blGr]thing[c:] around with you.
I hope we never see this place again...
Choose a creature to copy.
That's not going to do what you want it to do here…
There is nothing to copy. How unfortunate.
Well, here we are.
I've played along with your little game...
Your little [c:bR]mod[c:]...
Prepare yourself because it's my turn next...
Hey baby - I can sense that [c:bR]firey spirit[c:] inside you.
You and me - we got something in common - we love that [c:bR]fire[c:]!
Why don't you [c:bR]burn 3 of these bots to death?[c:]
Baby, I'll make it worth your time if you do...
Ohhh yeah baby - keep burning those bots to death...
Baby, I'll make it worth your time if you do...
Now that's what I'm talking about, baby!
That was [c:bR]absolutely sensational![c:]
Take this [c:bR]master of flame[c:] with you!
He will make your [c:bR]flame[c:] burn even brighter!
What did you just do?
What horrible thing did you put into my machine?
I'm going to have to throw this away and get a new one now.
Thanks a lot. You're definitely not getting your card back.
I had to go buy a new machine because of what you did last time.
Try to treat other people's stuff with some respect from now on.
Greetings! I'm a field researcher for [c:lGr]Global Conveyor Consortium[c:].
I'm looking for someone who would be willing to field test our patented [c:lGr]Bot Battle Conveyor Belts[c:].
Naturally, these tests would have to happen during [c:bR]actual combat[c:]!
If that's something you would be interested in, please speak to me again.
Oh fantastic! We will begin our [c:bR]combat trials[c:] immediately.
We will collect field trial data for your next [c:bR]three[c:] battles.
Once that is complete, come and see me again.
Our data is still not yet complete.
You have only completed [c:bR][v:0][c:] battles out of the required [c:bR]3[c:].
Please, continue the [c:bR]combat trials[c:] and see me when they are complete.
The trials were a smashing success!!
The [c:lGr]Global Conveyor Consortium[c:] is tremendously grateful for your contribution to our efforts.
To show their appreciation, they have authorized me to disburse the following.
Good luck in all of your future endeavours.
That's the bounty! Get him before he escapes!
He got away that time, but I guarantee he'll be back...
You got him! Nice job! Come and see me for your reward.
Howdy partner! You interested in earning a little extra spending money?
I've got myself a slippery little [c:bR]bounty[c:] that's been giving me all sorts of trouble.
I could use the help of a real go-getter like yourself to track them down and take them out.
If this is something you might be interested in, just talk to me again.
That's the spirit, partner!
All I need you to do is keep your eye out as you go into battle.
I guarantee you that slippery bastard will show up sooner or later...
Just keep your eye out, partner!
You'll catch him eventually!
Well done, partner!
Here's your bounty, as promised.
It's a little too heavy - try something else.
Dear traveler - I see you too have a love for the glorious [c:lGr]L33pB0t[c:]!
Yours has served you well in battle, it seems.
Allow me to show you its true potential...
I don't even know what to say to you!
You had the most glorious [c:lGr]L33pB0t[c:] in your posession...
And you let it go??!
Begone. I hope to never see you again.
Don't be an idiot. That card can't benefit from that item.
I found this sticker book in the trash can over there.
I think you can use it to decorate your cards, or something. I don't care.
I just love watching things [c:bR]explode[c:], don't you?
Everything around here seems to be just a little too...stable...
I think we could spice up your [c:bR]battles[c:] and make things truly interesting.
Talk to me again if you're interested in some truly explosive gameplay.
Ohhh yeah let's do it baby!
I'm going to light a fuse on every card for the next [c:bR]three[c:] battles.
Come find me again when that's complete!
I'm just buzzing with anticipation to see what happens next.
You've finished [c:bR][v:0][c:] battles out of [c:bR]3[c:].
Keep going, and see me when it's done!
That was some truly explosive gameplay!
Here's a little something for your trouble.
You can't afford that.
That [c:bR]warp node[c:] will unlock when you defeat the [c:bG]Uberbot[c:] on this map.
And by the way, I upgraded that [c:bR]minimap[c:] recently...
You can click any room you've visited before to travel there instantly.
You already have full energy. It won't do you any good to play that right now.
I've got something else to give you, but I can't right now. Come see me later!
I have a [c:bR][v:0][c:] for you, but you don't have room in your backback. Come see me when you do!
Choose which [c:bR]extra challenge rule[c:] will be applied to this battle.
We require you to select one [c:bR]additional experimental parameter[c:].
My librarians have asked you to choose [c:bR]which of these rules[c:] is your favorite.
Wow! These paintings are so pretty! Why don't you [c:bR]pick one[c:] for us to keep?
I think that [c:bSG]salmon[c:] is just so...majestic!
Select [c:bR]one of my paintings[c:] to add to your collection.
But first - you must [c:bR]choose a painting[c:] to be the background of our photographs.
Welcome to the [c:R]M[c:][c:bR]U[c:][c:O]L[c:][c:bG]T[c:][c:G]I[c:][c:blGr]V[c:][c:lGr]E[c:][c:B]R[c:][c:dB]S[c:][c:bB]E[c:]!
Your feeble mind will implode if you try to comprehend the vastness of my combined intellect.
So we'll stick to three of me at a time, okay?
And since you can't see through the [c:R]M[c:][c:bR]U[c:][c:O]L[c:][c:bG]T[c:][c:G]I[c:][c:blGr]V[c:][c:lGr]E[c:][c:B]R[c:][c:dB]S[c:][c:bB]E[c:] like we can,
We have provided these [c:bR]monitors[c:] to let you travel between universes.
Don't peek at things that aren't done yet!
Okay I'll give you that one. I went easy on you.
The next version of me won't.
How did that pile of trash beat me here?
There aren't even any good synergies in that deck.
No matter. There are plenty more of me. You can't beat us all.
Nobody topdecks that well. You must be cheating somehow.
I'm going to find a version of me that you literally can't beat now.
This can't be happening. It's not possible.
I'm literally synchronized across the multiverse and somehow you're still beating me.
You're cheating. You have to be. It's the only explanation.
Wait. Are [size:40][c:bR]they[c:][size:] helping you?
